# OCR Arcade
> Turn scanned images and PDFs into editable slides in minutes. Browser-based, privacy-first, and powerful.

OCR Arcade is a web application that bridges the gap between OCR and final presentation. It combines Tesseract.js for extraction with a visual canvas editor, allowing users to correct layout and text before exporting directly to PowerPoint (PPTX) or PNG.

## Documentation
- [README](https://github.com/winterdrive/OCR-Arcade/blob/main/README.md): Key features, tech stack, and quick start.
- [Full Context Documentation](https://winterdrive.github.io/OCR-Arcade/llms-full.txt): A single file containing the full documentation for AI context.

## Key Features
- **Local Processing**: Files stay in your browser.
- **Visual Editor**: Fix OCR errors in place.
- **PPTX Export**: Get editable slides, not just text dumps.
- **Multi-language**: Supports 10+ languages including English and Traditional Chinese.
